pullRequest.title: [HUDI-632] Update documentation (docker_demo) to mention both commit and deltacommit files
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the pull request
JIRA: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HUDI-632
Brief change log

Mentioned both commit and deltacommit files in docker_demo

Verify this pull request
This pull request is a trivial rework / code cleanup without any test coverage.
Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

commit.message: Update docs to specify commit/deltacommit variance for clarity

nodes.bodyText: @vikrantgoel can you please change the .md file? html is generated off that
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -543,7 +543,7 @@

Step 2: Incrementally

You can use HDFS web-browser to look at the tables http://namenode:50070/explorer.html#/user/hive/warehouse/stock_ticks_cow.

-

You can explore the new partition folder created in the table along with a “deltacommit” +

You can explore the new partition folder created in the table along with a “commit”/“deltacommit”

commit.message: for docker_demo updates, revert the changes on html apply the changes to md file instead
